Finally one skin worth buying
His outfit is exactly taking out from a Manga 'Tokyo Ghoul'.
The breif case for carrying it is even more proof its based on the Quinque from tokyo ghoul. nice pick up sir.
How can you say it is a reference to tokyo ghoul? A suit and tie is like the most common attire anyone has ever seen.
if you read the manga then you will know
nope its Men in black actually if you see his splash and they wear black suit and ties, hence "Men In Black" {{champion:5}} {{champion:17}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Men in Black {{champion:236}}
Or Tokyo Ghoul

I'm sorry Riot but this is probably the worst skin you guys have ever done....
The dimensions on the models chest is just horrid, it looks flat as paper.

P.s Don't think Secret Agents with long hair is a thing, really don't think the skin fits the champ at all sorry. Though A for effort at least.
there is nothing wrong with it fucktard
Spying with that spear ? .. really ? ..
IDK? A "secret agent" with a purple suit? Only 80s pimps or substance dealers would wear that.

How could he be a spy with that hair? It would get caught on things, and I can just imagine:
"How hey, you're that guy we have to look out for!"
"Dammit, how did you know?!"
"<.< We are psychic?"

Also, his suit appears to be so skin tight his tie and collar have no dimensions whatsoever.
The splash art has real Adam Jensen vibe about it. Probably the yellow.
Zhao Xin Zhao.
